casebody.data:
NEWTON WEST, LTD., Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
TOWN OF NEWTON, Defendant-Petitioner. C-779 September Term 2017
080140 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001976-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
